tool_description: Creates push notification payloads for mobile apps with proper formatting for iOS and Android platforms.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: order_confirmed, payment_received, shipped, delivered

error_messages: Invalid notification_type: Must be one of [order_confirmed, payment_received, shipped, delivered]
Invalid platform: Must be one of [ios, android, both]
Missing customer_id: Customer ID is required for push notification targeting
Payload generation failed: Unable to create notification payload due to invalid parameters
usage: Provide customer_id, order_id, notification_type, and target platform. The tool creates properly formatted push notification payloads for the specified platform(s).

ios_payload.description: JSON formatted payload for iOS (if applicable)

android_payload.description: JSON formatted payload for Android (if applicable)

deep_link.description: Deep link URL to relevant app section
